messages.subject: what church
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/7/03 4:53:46 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/7/03 4:53:46 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<<
I guess I'm just a bit too far south than! <BG> Or maybe I do look
like a heathen. >>

South Florida does NOT count as the South....you are in a different world
Mary, trust me.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett

messages.subject: what church
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 3/7/03 4:53:46 PM Central Standard Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 3/7/03 4:53:46 PM Central Standard Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Not sure where you live but here in the south that is the first thing they
ask, sometimes even before they ask your name. LOL
Pam G >>

Yep, yep, yep.
Especially if you dared show your face at a curriculum fair...ugh.
I used to say "I don't go." and then change the topic.
I wonder, now that I go to Unity, if that would evoke an even stronger
response? hmmmm...might be worth trying.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
